pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spectral Clustering-Based Method for Identifying B Cell Clones // Provides a computational framework for B cell clones identification from adaptive immune receptor repertoire sequencing (AIRR-Seq) datasets. Three models are included (identical, hierarchical, and spectral) that perform clustering among sequences of BCRs/IGs (B cell receptors/immunoglobulins) which share the same V gene, J gene and junction length. Nouri N and Kleinstein SH (2018) doi: 10.1093/bioinformatics/bty235. Gupta NT, et al. (2017) doi: 10.4049/jimmunol.1601850.
